gw.plugin.approval

Class ApprovalResult

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.plugin.approval.ApprovalResult
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GWRemotable, java.io.Serializable

    public final class ApprovalResult
extends java.lang.Object
implements GWRemotable, java.io.Serializable
    This class stores the results from an approval request. It indicates the following:
    • if approval is required
    • if the requesting user has the appropriate authority limits to attempt approval
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static ApprovalResult NO_APPROVAL_REQUIRED
      Approval result used when no approval is required.
      static ApprovalResult NO_AUTHORITY
      Approval result used when the user has no authority and thus the item can not be submitted at all.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ApprovalResult()
      Constructs an approval result for the common case: the user has authority and doesn't require approval.
      ApprovalResult(boolean hasAuthority, boolean requiresApproval, java.lang.String[] messages)

    • Method Detail

      • isHasAuthority

        public boolean isHasAuthority()
        Returns:
        true if the result indicates that the user has at least one relevant authority limit and so can attempt approval, else returns false

      • setHasAuthority

        public void setHasAuthority(boolean hasAuthority)

      • isRequiresApproval

        public boolean isRequiresApproval()
        Returns:
        true if the result indicates that approval is required, else returns false

      • getCombinedMessages

        public java.lang.String getCombinedMessages()
        Combines the messages created by the approval process into one long string, with individual messages separated by linebreaks.
        Returns:
        String containing the combined messages.
